title: Padre Island National Seashore: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         WebRangers is the National Park Service's on-line Junior Ranger program for kids of all ages.   Junior Ranger Program Ask a ranger for a Junior Ranger booklet when you stop by the Malaquite Visitor Center, send us a message to have a booklet sent to you, or download a .PDF version here. The Underwater Explorer Junior Ranger Program, Historic Preservation Junior Ranger Program, and NPS Centennial Junior Ranger Program booklets are available as well. For all those who are young or young-at-heart, come out and earn your badge today! Click here for more information on our Junior Ranger programs at Padre Island National Seashore. Web Rangers Visit WebRangers online to play games and to visit your country's national parks from your computer at home. You can even earn rewards by completing fun activities like navigating through an underwater field of seagrass, patrolling the Arctic with your own dog sled team, sailing on a whaling voyage around the world, and even designing your own ranger station.
